definitions.definition: A blood clot formed from platelets and other elements that forms in a blood vessel in a living organism , and causes thrombosis or obstruction of the vessel at its point of formation or travel to other areas of the body.

main_definition: ( hematology , pathology ) A blood clot formed from platelets and other elements that forms in a blood vessel in a living organism , and causes thrombosis or obstruction of the vessel at its point of formation or travel to other areas of the body.
